pages.title: Potion of Danger Sight
pages.text: A potion of danger sight reveals where mobs can spawn in the world. To brew one use awkard potions and a glowshroom. Glowshrooms can be found in rare cave biomes.

pages.title: Potion of Stability
pages.text: A potion that provides the player with reduced knockback from attacks. To brew one you can use awkard potions and crab shells.

pages.title: Potion of Decay
pages.text: A potion that gives the effected entity the wither effect. It is brewed using awkard potions and a wither rose.
